title: G1btc
author: G1btc
content: Hello,I Happy to announce here that I've published my new app 'Share Link' on play store.This is a tool app for get traffic for website,New app, referral link etc.The app also features to earn reward by viewing sites, referring new users, playing spinwheel games etc and withdraw to your account.For more details Go to play store-https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.share.link I'll give 100RP bonus to first 50 members And also give 100RP bonus for positive rating ( 4 or 5 star rating) on play store with a nice comment (don't copy paste or identical or short comment) and after than comment below with your app referralid, play store username  for regarding as a positive ratting and comment on play store..Currently we allowed user from Argentina,Australia,Brazil,Canada,China,France,Germany,India,Israel,Itely,Japan, New Zealand,Russia,Saudi Arabia, Spain,Switzerland,Turkey,United Arab Emirates,United Kingdom And United States.
